name: Zephyr (TingleChowder)
description:
This is my new game I'm working on!  Only got a really short demo out without audio yet but I plan to update!

Controls:

A - left

D - right

W - up / talk to NPC

S - down

Space - jump (you can also jump off of walls!)

J - attack

Esc - pause

Enter - select on menus / continue dialogue
